docs.text:
Introduction


Why Math 122?


It's thought in elementary school that everything builds up to calculus. This ignores a bunch of things like Analysis, Algebra and Combinatorics.


Foundations


We're going to look at:




Sets


Relations


Functions




Example






Socrates is a man


All men are mortal
Is socrates Mortal?






Solution
: Yes. Socrates is mortal.
